summary: A collection of helper routines for speaker diarization workflows, covering RTTM parsing and generation, label conversion, embedding normalization, timestamp handling, VAD validation, and both offline and online clustering. It also includes an online segmentor that extracts short speech‑focused subsegments from a streaming audio buffer for embedding extraction.
business_intent: Enable robust speaker diarization and clustering capabilities within speech recognition systems, supporting both batch and real‑time processing scenarios.
